name: Aidsmoji: The Forbidden Fruit
description: Alright boys and girls, this is Aidsmoji aka the best game in the whole world. You know my grandparents always told me 'Common sense is genius dressed in his bath' and that's why I decided to make this game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Xp / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 2 GB available space
